title: 2 story house for immediately sale in Battaramulla
details: Urgent sale with furniture and curtain, 3.km to Battaramulla town, 4 bed rooms, one room is AC, 3 bath rooms, pantry area, living area, dining area, shrine room, can easily park 3 vehicles, driver's room, servant toilet, tiled floor, perfect condition, no any repairs, totally colour washed, 23 ft width gate
